branchItem.name: HRZ, High Performance Specialty Chiller, Fluorinated Coolant Type
branchItem.bullets: <UL><LI>Cooling capacities: 1kW, 2kW, 4kW, 8kW <LI>Temperature range setting: -20 to 40°C, 20 to 90°C, -20 to 90°C <LI>Temperature stability: ±0.1°C <LI>Power supply requirement: 3-phase 200 VAC / 50Hz or 3-phase 200~208 VAC / 60Hz <LI>Standards: CE, UL, SEMI (S2-0703, S8-0701, F47-0200), SEMATECH (S2-93, S8-95) <LI>Circulating fluid: Fluorinert™ or GALDEN® (see catalog for compatibility) </LI></UL>
